name: Sluggy Jean Takes a Hike
description:
Sluggy Jean Takes a Hike is a game about Sluggy Jean's Journey through 50 unique mazes.
They use their sticky slug abilities to jump onto walls and find their way through each maze.
After enough levels, They challenge the universe!
And after doing so, Sluggy Jean finds themself trying their best to escape through each maze in an attempt to take down the challenger.
